CustomField.formula: CASE( RecordType.DeveloperName, 'Accident', cve__DateOfAccident__c, 'AccidentalDeathAndDismemberment', IF(cve__DismembermentAndLoss__c, cve__DateOfLoss__c, cve__DateOfDeath__c), 'Annuity', cve__DateOfDeath__c, 'Cancer', cve__DateOfDiagnosis__c, 'CriticalIllness', cve__DateOfDiagnosis__c, 'HospitalIndemnity', cve__HospitalStartDate__c, 'IncomeProtection', cve__DateOfDisability__c, 'Indemnity', cve__HospitalStartDate__c, 'LongTermCare', cve__DateCareStarted__c, 'LongTermDisability',cve__DateOfDisability__c, 'ShortTermDisability', cve__DateOfDisability__c, 'Survivor', cve__DateOfDeath__c, 'TermLife', cve__DateOfDeath__c, 'TotalAndPermanentDisability', cve__DateOfDisability__c, 'UniversalLife', cve__DateOfDeath__c, 'WaiverOfPremium', cve__DateOfDisability__c, 'Wellness', cve__DateOfWellnessService__c, 'WholeLife', cve__DateOfDeath__c, null )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The date of the event being claimed for e.g. the Date of Disability or the Date of Death.
CustomField.label: Event Date
